info.abstract:
[Behaviour] Counts the number of elements into an array.
[Parameters] - input measure type : Ophidia typing. Supported types are: 'oph_double'; 'oph_float'; 'oph_int'; 'oph_long'; 'oph_short'; 'oph_byte'. - output measure type : not used. - measure : first input measure. - missing values : use '1' (default) to include missing values, use '0' to exclude them.
[Return type] Long-long.
[Examples] oph_count_array('OPH_FLOAT','',measure)
